author: ryanleeschneider
content: So RE: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/486 are clients settling on setting `baseFeePerBlobGas` and `blobGasUsedRatio` value for pre-Cancun blocks to `0`?  It looks like that's what `reth` and NetherMind are doing.  <@508125616940515329> what did you land on?  Likewise w/ `eth_blobBaseFee` I could see arguments for returning anything from `null` to `0` to a JSONRPC error pre-activation.
